name: There Are No Bad Heroes in This World
author: Hansol
content: Choi Hyun-seok, who was once the mightiest man, begins a new life as a hero in another world after his death. &quotA hero who monopolizes wealth, fame, and beautiful women!&quot Dreaming of a glorious future, he arrives in the other world, only to encounter a monstrous beast with a head one size larger than his own. The monster, a high-ranking officer of the Demon King’s army, asked: &quotHero? Are you the so-called hero?&quot &quotUh… I guess I’m the hero…?&quotAnd so, hell began.
